sentences.english: Our Chinese ancestors came across the ocean, sailing south to find a way for living.
sentences.chinese: 我們的族祖先飄洋過海，下南洋討生活。

sentences.english: A year and half have past; and I live on the other side of the world.
sentences.chinese: 一年半過去了，我飄洋過海來到這裏。

sentences.english: But now it appears to have drifted across the Atlantic。
sentences.chinese: 而如今這一趨勢更是飄洋過海傳到了歐洲。

sentences.english: Bothwell went over the sea,and died in a prison in Denmark.
sentences.chinese: 博思韋爾飄洋過海，並死在了丹麥的監獄中。

sentences.english: Even in the Middle Ages only the most daring went to lands beyond the sea. The human pursuit of security conditioned men to love their homes.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在中世紀也只有最勇敢的人才敢飄洋過海。

sentences.english: It's said that the Eight Immortals got drunk here before flying across the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 傳說八仙就是在這裏喝醉了酒才一起飄洋過海的。

sentences.english: To cross the sea to any foreign soil.
